steps.name: Given I have a clean namespace
And I have a service called 'entando-k8s-service'
And I have configured a ProvidedCapability for SSO in the namespace
And I have created an EntandoApp custom resource
When I run the entando-k8s-app-controller container against the EntandoApp

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As an Entando Operator users, I want to use a Docker container to process an EntandoApp so that I don't need to know any of its implementation details to use it.
